name: AnobiUIKit
summary: AnobiUIKit - collection of various UIKit-dependent classes and categories useful to Objective-C iOS Developer.
description:
AnobiUIKit - collection of various UIKit-dependent classes and categories useful to Objective-C iOS Developer.
